text: Antoine Franklin McColister (born May 11, 1988), better known by his stage name Ace Hood, is an American rapper. He is best known for his hit singles “Hustle Hard” and “Bugatti.” He has received 4 award nominations. He was signed to DJ Khaled's label We the Best Music Group in 2008. Hood married Shelah Marie in 2020. He appeared on Love & Hip Hop: Miami. ==Discography== Ace Hood has released 5 albums: * Gutta (2008) * Ruthless (2009) * Blood, Sweat & Tears (2011) * Trials & Tribulations (2013) * Mr. Hood (2020) * M.I.N.D. (Memories Inside Never Die) (2022) Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Haitian musicians Category:Rappers from Florida Category:Gangsta rappers
title: Ace Hood
